Package com.yash.ecommerce.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.yash.ecommerce.controller.UserController
@CrossOrigin @RestController @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
the responsibility of this controller is to handle the product cart and order item request.
Author:
dheerendra.kag
